headline: How Netflix, Paramount Sparked A $108 Billion Media War For Warner Bros. Discovery
summary: The sale of HBO-owner Warner Bros. Discovery (NASDAQ:WBD) has become the entertainment and streaming industry’s Game of Thrones, with Netflix Inc (NASDAQ:NFLX) and Paramount Skydance (NASDAQ:PSKY) battling for control. Warner Bros.’ decision to favor Netflix’s $82.7 billion offer triggered a $108 billion hostile takeover bid from Paramount for the company's entire slate of media assets. headline: Netflix Stock: Buy, Sell, or Hold?
summary: Netflix's Warner Bros. deal puts capital discipline -- and valuation -- under a harsher spotlight.

headline: The FTSE 100 Soared in 2025. Making the Case for 2026.
summary: As the year nears its end, London’s benchmark index is outpacing the S&P 500--and without the high-octane fuel of artificial intelligence. Can it do it again?
